how do i know it is time to do wheel alignment?
balancing and alignment got any difference?
Balancing is put weights on the wheel to make the wheel CG balanced.
Alignment is the position of all 4 wheels relative to the chassis.
Do alignment if your tyre wear uneven or your steering wheel doesn't return center when driving straight
But always good to do alignment once in a while
Because if you hit potholes can make it run
